page.title: 06Life of Carol (p.m.)
page.content: For the afternoon school session I leave home at one o'clock. I play elastic with my friends until the bell goes at one twenty five. The first lesson is history, which is about our school in days gone by. The school is one hundred and twenty two years old. This is followed by art and craft. For the last session I continue my work in geography. School finishes at three thirty but I stay on for the badminton club; for this I go to the new Youth and Community Centre which is very near the school. I play until five o'clock when I go home. In the evening I go to the local Youth Club where I meet my friends and we go roller skating. After buying some refreshments I leave as I have to be home for nine o'clock.
